refnamediv.refpurpose: Restores the value of the include_path configuration option

refsect1.title: Description

example.title: Example use of restore_include_path
example.programlisting:
<?php

print get_include_path();  // .:/usr/local/lib/php

set_include_path('/inc');

print get_include_path();  // /inc

// Works as of PHP 4.3.0
restore_include_path();

// Works in all PHP versions
ini_restore('include_path');

print get_include_path();  // .:/usr/local/lib/php

?>

refsect1.simpara: See also ini_restore, set_include_path, get_include_path, and include.
